topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d820c16368720c527f0100#post_53d820c16368720c527f0100
Eeyup; the internet has finally adopted idol culture similar to Japanese idol culture in that internet idols are now memetically being made out of mere looks and such.  What I mean by this is for example how a couple months ago Natalia was the internet's waifu.  This sort of idol culture has been around in Japan for a while, but now the internet's gotten a hold of this idol culture.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d821976368721257aa0100#post_53d821976368721257aa0100
Exactly.
It is sheer insanity.

Speaking of insanity, can anyone defeat Madara?

And I'm not talking about Edo Tensei Uchiha Madara. Hell, I'm not even talking about Gedou Rinne Tensei Uchiha Madara. I'm talking Juubi Jinchuuriki Gedou Rinne Tensei Uchiha Madara with the Eternal Mangekyou Sharingan and Rinnegan doujutsus (with the rikodou abilities and being capable of both Amateratsu and Tsukuyomi genjutsu), equipped with his Gunbai, a perfect Susano'o, control of the juubi and Gedou Mazou, with Hashirama Senju's DNA implanted in him so he has mokuton kekkei genkai and can perform yin yang release ninjutsu while being an expert in kenjutsu and taijutsu.

As for the sperm thing, it's generally a feature of human society to value eggs over sperm as the window of female fertility is smaller than the male.

Exactly.
It is sheer insanity.

Speaking of insanity, can anyone defeat Madara?

And I'm not talking about Edo Tensei Uchiha Madara. Hell, I'm not even talking about Gedou Rinne Tensei Uchiha Madara. I'm talking Juubi Jinchuuriki Gedou Rinne Tensei Uchiha Madara with the Eternal Mangekyou Sharingan and Rinnegan doujutsus (with the rikodou abilities and being capable of both Amateratsu and Tsukuyomi genjutsu), equipped with his Gunbai, a perfect Susano'o, control of the juubi and Gedou Mazou, with Hashirama Senju's DNA implanted in him so he has mokuton kekkei genkai and can perform yin yang release ninjutsu while being an expert in kenjutsu and taijutsu.[/bq]
And that ladies and gentlemen is why Naruto is utter bullshit.

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d822d16368720cd9b30100#post_53d822d16368720cd9b30100
[bq="Whatevs"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d82237636872107ae40100#post_53d82237636872107ae40100
Well they care because they are probably saying she should have a family. I'm not saying she should but that is probably the sentiment expressed by those words.

As for the sperm thing, it's generally a feature of human society to value eggs over sperm as the window of female fertility is smaller than the male.[/bq]
You have to admit it's kind of bullshit; equating a person's worth as a person solely on their basis of their ability to have kids is kind of bullshit.
